feed.title: Derek R Olson
feed.subtitle: Academic webpage for Derek R. Olson

entry.title: First Post!
entry.content:
Hello World

I have been at the Naval Postgraduate School for three years now, so it’s high time to make a website. I expect to fill in the graphics and cool stuff part of this website first. I might even blog about technical, semi-techincal, and totally frivolous things.
entry.summary: Hello World I have been at the Naval Postgraduate School for three years now, so it’s high time to make a website. I expect to fill in the graphics and cool stuff part of this website first. I might even blog about technical, semi-techincal, and totally frivolous things.
